title: China to bring reduced lending rates amid slowing economy growth
description: China is poised to implement substantial reductions to its fundamental lending rates this year. This move comes in response to increasing demands on policymakers and banks to counteract a declining growth trend and stimulate weakened demand within the globe’s second-largest economy.  The upcoming monthly assembly on Monday by the People’s Bank of China is expected ... title: Altcoins Flashing Bullish Signal After Last Week’s Bloodbath, According to Analytics Firm Santiment
description:
New data from market intelligence firm Santiment suggests that altcoins may recoup some of their losses from the crypto market’s sharp downturn last week. According to the crypto analytics platform, altcoins are “overwhelmingly showing undervaluation” after last week’s bloodbath, leaving investors divided on how quickly the markets can recover.
